definition: shield/(currency) Vietnamese dong/currency unit of several countries (Indonesian rupiah, Dutch gulden etc)

sentences.english: In this way, it might be possible to turn shields—instead of swords—into plowshares .
sentences.chinese: 也許可以把防禦用的盾牌變成鋤頭。

sentences.english: Added a new recipe for shield reinforcements that increases the block value of shields.
sentences.chinese: 增加了一個新的配方，可爲盾牌附魔增加其格擋值。

sentences.english: And the Philistine came on and drew near unto David; and the man that bare the shield went before him.
sentences.chinese: 非利士人也漸漸的迎着大衛來拿盾牌的走在前頭。

sentences.english: Some officers lashed out with batons and shields, but their superiors restrained them.
sentences.chinese: 一些警察揮動着警棍和盾牌，但被他們的上級阻止了。

sentences.english: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadarezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他奪了哈大利謝臣僕所拿的金盾牌帶到耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: The only shield to his memory is the rectitude and sincerity of his actions.
sentences.chinese: 在追憶往事時，唯一的盾牌是他的行爲正直和誠實。

sentences.english: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadadezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他奪了哈大底謝臣僕所拿的金盾牌，帶到耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: David took the gold shields carried by the officers of Hadadezer and brought them to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他奪了哈大利謝臣僕所拿的金盾牌帶到耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: One security guard used it as a shield against the torrent of people that streamed into the store.
sentences.chinese: 有個保安把該門板用作盾牌，抵擋湧入商場的人潮。

sentences.english: Added Lordly status very rare chance for Steel Shield.
sentences.chinese: 增加了很難得到的堂皇的鋼鐵盾牌。

sentences.english: Collect shields to plow through your opponents with.
sentences.chinese: 收集盾牌可以自由通過你的對手。

sentences.english: He is a shield for all who take refuge in him.
sentences.chinese: 凡投靠他的，他便作他們的盾牌。

sentences.english: Fixed missing shields stats for Dismounted Templar.
sentences.chinese: 固定失蹤盾牌統計卸除坦普勒。

sentences.english: Right mindfulness is a shield that protects us from our enemies.
sentences.chinese: 正念如盾牌，可以抵禦強敵，何衛自身。

sentences.english: He moved his shield quickly, and the sword glanced off.
sentences.chinese: 他迅速移動盾牌，於是劍掠過了盾牌。

sentences.english: He moved his shield quickly, and the sword glanced off.
sentences.chinese: 他迅速移動盾牌，於是劍掠過了盾牌。

definition: shield/(currency) Vietnamese dong/currency unit of several countries (Indonesian rupiah, Dutch gulden etc)
